page.title: 15A SHOP OWNER'S VIEWS.
page.content:
A small shop owner in Almondsbury was interviewed. She said that{farms are{disappearing}very quickly and new houses are being built instead. The{farmhouse}which used to be next to the shop has now been{knocked down {and is}now {AZTEC WEST}offices.The same thing will be happening to Woodlands Lane. An average of about 600 people live in the village. In the evening the younger people in the village go to the{social club}which is just down the road from the shop. The older people go to the sports centre for outside activities and bowling.
The{motorway}hasn't made any difference to the store because the owner has learnt to live with the {noise}and the motorway is quite along way from the shop.
